text: Pokémon Mystery Dungeon is a spin-off series of Pokémon video games made by Spike Chunsoft (formerly Chunsoft). The player's character is turned into a Pokémon and forms a team with another Pokémon. They rescue other Pokémon and explore "mystery dungeons” where floor maps are randomly generated. At the start of the game's story, players have to answer a personality test to determine what Pokémon they turn into. == Games == * Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Blue and Red Rescue Team (2005/2006, GBA/DS) * Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Time and Darkness (2007/2008, DS) * Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Sky (2009, DS) * Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Adventure Squad (2009, WiiWare, Japan only) * Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Gates to Infinity (2012/2013, 3DS) * Pokémon Super Mystery Dungeon (2015/2016, 3DS) * Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Rescue Team DX (2020, Switch) == References == * Category:Roguelike video games Category:Role-playing video games Category:Tactical role-playing video games
